trans-unit.source: Enumerates values of subset matching mode.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值的比對模式的子集。

trans-unit.source: In System.Speech, you can construct a grammar that successfully recognizes a phrase even though only a subset of its contents is found in the audio input.
trans-unit.target: System.Speech，在您可以建構成功辨識片語，即使其內容的子集音訊的輸入中找到的文法。

trans-unit.source: By default, a recognition engine requires an exact match against an entire phrase.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，辨識引擎至少需要整個片語完全相符。

trans-unit.source: The recognition engine can also match partial phrases according to parameters defined by a SubsetMatchingMode member used as an argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset.%23ctor%2A> constructors, or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 辨識引擎也可以符合根據 SubsetMatchingMode 成員做為引數所定義的參數部分片語<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset.%23ctor%2A>建構函式，或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSubset.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustrates how each of the SubsetMatchingMode members affects recognition when used in a grammar that contains the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明每個 SubsetMatchingMode 成員會辨識用於文法包含片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 時的影響。

trans-unit.source: **OrderedSubset** This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input.
trans-unit.target: **OrderedSubset**此模式表示片語的子集合將用於成功辨識該整個片語，如果下列條件成立:-在音訊的輸入中才能辨識片語中的一個或多個字。

trans-unit.source: - The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase.
trans-unit.target: 集這些可辨識的字的相對順序會與片語中的相同。

trans-unit.source: - Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles.
trans-unit.target: -只有介系詞和文件可能包含相符的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubset mode produces the following result on recognition: |**Input Phrase**|**Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"a car the truck a boat that plane"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"a car the truck a boat"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"a car the that plane"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.
trans-unit.target: 片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 加入使用 OrderedSubset 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果: |**Input Phrase**|**Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"車輛的船的平面 truck"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 已辨識。 | |"汽車的船 truck"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 已辨識。 | |"汽車的平面"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。

trans-unit.source: A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"a car the boat a truck that plane"|Recognition is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 不需要可辨識的子集是一連串的原始字串。 | |"汽車的卡車的平面船"|無法成功辨識。

trans-unit.source: The words are out of order.| |"a the"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.
trans-unit.target: 單字會失序。 | |""|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。

trans-unit.source: Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **OrderedSubsetContentRequired** This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input, and - The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase.
trans-unit.target: 介系詞和發行項可用來辨識。 | **OrderedSubsetContentRequired**此模式表示片語的子集合將用於成功辨識該整個片語，如果下列條件成立:-片語中的一個或多個字在音訊的輸入中，辨識和-的相對順序的辨識文字是與片語中的相同。

trans-unit.source: - Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles.
trans-unit.target: -相符的文字不能由只有介系詞和發行項所組成。

trans-unit.source: Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using OrderedSubsetContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**Input Phrase**|**Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"a car the truck a boat that plane"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"a car the truck a boat"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"a car the that plane"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.
trans-unit.target: 片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 加入使用 OrderedSubsetContentRequired 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果: |**Input Phrase**|**Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"汽車的船的平面 truck"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 已辨識。 | |"汽車的船 truck"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 已辨識。 | |"汽車的平面"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。

trans-unit.source: A recognized subset is not required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"a car the boat a truck that plane"|Recognition is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 不需要可辨識的子集是一連串的原始字串。 | |"汽車的卡車的平面船"|無法成功辨識。

trans-unit.source: The words are out of order.| |"a the"|Recognition is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 單字會失序。 | |""|無法成功辨識。

trans-unit.source: Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.| **Subsequence:** This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - One or more words in the phrase are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase, and - The relative order of those recognized words is the same as in the phrase.
trans-unit.target: 語音輸入必須包含文章和介系詞以外的文字。 | **序列︰**此模式表示片語的子集合將用於成功辨識該整個片語，如果下列條件成立:-一或多個單字在片語中的音訊的輸入中識別為一連串的片語，和-的相對順序的辨識文字是相同的片語。

trans-unit.source: - Matched words may consist of only prepositions and articles.
trans-unit.target: -只有介系詞和文件可能包含相符的文字。

trans-unit.source: Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using Subsequence mode produces the following result on recognition: |**Input Phrase**|**Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"a car the truck a boat that plane"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"a car the truck a boat"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"a car the that plane"|Recognition is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 加入文法，使用子序列模式會產生下列的辨識結果: |**Input Phrase**|**Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"車輛的船的平面 truck"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 已辨識。 | |"車輛的船 truck"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 已辨識。 | |"汽車的平面"|無法成功辨識。

trans-unit.source: A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"a car the boat a truck that plane"|Recognition is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 可辨識的子集時需要一連串的原始字串。 | |"汽車的卡車的平面船"|無法成功辨識。

trans-unit.source: The words are out of order.| |"a the"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.
trans-unit.target: 單字會失序。 | |""|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 是可辨識。

trans-unit.source: Prepositions and articles are used for recognition.| **SubsequenceContentRequired** This mode indicates that a subset of the phrase will be used to successfully recognize the entire phrase if the following are true: - One or more words in the match string are recognized in the audio input as a sequence of the phrase.
trans-unit.target: 介系詞和發行項可用來辨識。 | **SubsequenceContentRequired**此模式表示片語的子集合將用於成功辨識該整個片語，如果下列條件成立:-比對字串中的一個或多個單字中音訊輸入辨識為一連串的片語。

trans-unit.source: - Matched words cannot consist of only prepositions and articles.
trans-unit.target: -相符的文字不能由只有介系詞和發行項所組成。

trans-unit.source: Adding the phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" to a grammar using SubsequenceContentRequired mode produces the following result on recognition: |**Input Phrase**|**Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"a car the truck a boat that plane"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"a car the truck a boat"|The entire phrase "a car the truck a boat that plane" is recognized.| |"a car the that plane"|Recognition is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 加入使用 SubsequenceContentRequired 文法模式會產生下列的辨識結果: |**Input Phrase**|**Result**| |----------------------|----------------| |"車輛的船的平面 truck"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 已辨識。 | |"汽車的船 truck"|整個片語 「 汽車船之平面的卡車 」 已辨識。 | |"車輛的平面"|無法成功辨識。

trans-unit.source: A recognized subset is required to be a sequence of the original string.| |"a car the boat a truck that plane"|Recognition is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 可辨識的子集時需要一連串的原始字串。 | |"汽車的卡車的平面船"|無法成功辨識。

trans-unit.source: The words are out of order.| |"a the"|Recognition is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 單字會失序。 | |""|無法成功辨識。

trans-unit.source: Speech input must contain words other than articles and prepositions.|
trans-unit.target: 語音輸入必須包含文章和介系詞以外的文字。 |

trans-unit.source: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubset**.
trans-unit.target: 表示比對的模式子集**OrderedSubset**。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that subset matching mode is **OrderedSubsetContentRequired**.
trans-unit.target: 表示比對的模式子集**OrderedSubsetContentRequired**。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that subset matching mode is **Subsequence**.
trans-unit.target: 表示比對的模式子集**序列**。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that subset matching mode is **SubsequenceContentRequired**.
trans-unit.target: 表示比對的模式子集**SubsequenceContentRequired**。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
